subject: Basketball
Knees
Surgery and Surgeons
lead_paragraph: Charlotte forward Sean May will miss the season because he will have surgery on his right knee Tuesday in New York. Recovery will take 6 to 12 months. The 6-foot-9 May, picked 13th in the 2005 draft, has played in only 58 games in two seasons, averaging 10.4 points and 5.9 rebounds.
